title: What are some examples of HR tech companies that failed? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have a list of a few companies that have straight-up failed: BranchOut, Blissbook, JobKatch, Koozi, Remarkable Hire, Work Simple. I also have a list of companies that were acquired and have fizzled (or are fizzling): Rypple, Bswif, Za0, Broadbean, SocialReferral, Assess Systems, Evolv (probably because of the lack of an "e") KnowledgeAdvisors, Vana Workforce, Distill, Reschedge , NuView Systems, Mobolt, PeopleAnswers, CrossKnowledge, PDI Ninth House, Bright, Careerify, Gozaik, TalentBin, My Staffing Pro, Async Interview, Fieldglass, MindLeaders, HR Plus, Meritshare, Identified. Also suggested that exits could be listed as failures: Vurv, SuccessFactors, Jobs2Web, Kenexa, Peoplesoft, and Brassring.  Who's on your list?
